Team-Based Interdisciplinary Research Kiona Ogle & Katharyn Duffy 2021-06-01 Chapter 1 Prerequisites This is a sample book written in Markdown that Iâ€™m using as a basic template. Bookdown is one of my very favorite Rstudio/Github shortcuts! The bookdown package can be installed from CRAN or Github: install.packages("bookdown") # or the development version # devtools::install_github("rstudio/bookdown") Remember each Rmd file contains one and only one chapter, and a chapter is defined by the first-level heading #. To compile this example to PDF, you need XeLaTeX. You are recommended to install TinyTeX (which includes XeLaTeX): https://yihui.name/tinytex/.
